hypothesis_content.title: Term Structure Inversion as Bear Regime Early Warning
hypothesis_content.statement: When BTC quarterly futures curve inverts (front month > back month) during BULL regime while spot price is >20% above 200-day MA, this signals high probability (≥65%) of transition to NEUTRAL/BEAR within 15 trading days.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Term structure inversion during overbought bull markets indicates excessive leverage and impending deleveraging. Combines derivatives overheating with momentum extremes. Current market shows elevated but not inverted term structure, making this preemptive.
entry_conditions: BTC futures: Mar contract > Jun contract (inversion)

exit_conditions.take_profit: Regime shifts to NEUTRAL/BEAR OR 10% price decline from local high
exit_conditions.stop_loss: Term structure returns to contango without price decline

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Inversions resolve through sideways/upward price action in >50% of cases OR fail to predict regime change within specified timeframe.
